name: Kill The DJ!
description:
Kill The DJ!

TL;DR: Aim with mouse, Move with WASD. Avoid the robots! Shoot the DJ when the shield drops!

Story:
Our hero has rolled his way into the wrong night club! DJ Necromancer has taken control over the dance floor, and is forcing you and your robot friends to fight each other! Luckily you have some coloured blazers lying around, but your robots friends are immune to shots of the same colour! To end this madness there's only one option left. You have to stop the music! You have to Kill The DJ!

Instructions: 
With your mouse, aim at the robots to defend yourself! Move with WASD to avoid their metal claws! If you're lucky, the DJ might just drop his guard, allowing you to hurt him! But watch out! The DJ has made you lose control of when to shoot, so you will have to listen to the music!

Credits: 
Programmer: André Lima e Silva (Twitter)
Art/Design: Mat Graz (Instagram)
Music/Sound Effects: Torben 'Tripp1n' Nordtorp (Twitter)
